document_data.title: Turn Back the Endless Night
document_data.design: [[Greg Marks]]{{Cite adventurers league/Turn Back the Endless Night|1}}
document_data.story arc:
''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]''
''Broken Chains'' Series
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Turn Back the Endless Night''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Chult]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 17{{th}}- to 20{{th}}-level characters. It is the fourth and final part in the ''Broken Chains'' series.
{{Quote|''Your foe seeks to unlock the Iron Door beneath the Peaks of Flame and open the way for the Eater of the World. You must find your way through the maze of tunnels and stop them, or it will be the end of all things.''|}}
